Html:
Hi.

I have worked audio player with your library. But, I have a big problem.

Additional Metering_Stream Notification event occurs irregularly after Pause() method is executed.

I hope this is fixed.

Thank you.

Why is this a problem for you? This is the nature of multithreaded applications. Sometimes you will get notifications after you have pressed pause. There is no easy way around this.

Mark

Thank you for your reply.

I'll look for a workaround.
